data.title: Play Strategy Games | 1 to 20 of 417 Free Online Strategy Games | Sorted By Rating (DESC)
meta_keywords: Mike Shadow: I paid for it!
data.meta_description: Play Strategy Games | 1 to 20 of 417 Free Online Strategy Games | Sorted By Rating (DESC) | The best flash Strategy games online. Play the best Strategy games like: Infectonator 2, Castaway 2, Rebuild, Zombie Trailer Park, Desktop Tower Defense, Mike Shadow: I paid for it!, Blow Things Up, Learn to Fly 2, FishNeedWater, Dibbles: For the Greater Good
data.text:
Infectonator 2

Sequel to the hit Infectonator series, this new game adds a lot of depth, giving you the control to infect entire continents one by one, more funny characters, better graphics, and more! Best of all, it still has the same addictive chain reaction gameplay! (Rating: 4.32)

Castaway 2

Stranded on a mysterious island, it is up to you to find a way off. Embark on a journey that takes you through vast terrains and unique environments... (Rating: 4.31)

Rebuild

Humanity is suffering another Apocalypse. The city is not recognizable any more: the streets are full of roaming zombies who are catching live people and attacking their refuge... (Rating: 4.31)

Zombie Trailer Park

Zombies have taken over the Metropolis - luckily you were never much for city folk. But now the zombies have turned their sights on your trailer park! Manage your economy and train fighting units to defend your trailer park. (Rating: 4.31)

Mike Shadow: I paid for it!

The most epic combat ever. Fight for what is yours and unleash your wrath - Very addictive! (Rating: 4.27)

Blow Things Up

Blowing things up is fun! Blow up 42 exciting and challenging levels in this physics based game. Try to knock the bad guys off their perches and save the good guys but don't worry if you don't, it's all good! It just means you get to blow it all up again! (Rating: 4.27)

Learn to Fly 2

You were able to learn how to fly, but Icebergs stopped you and crushed your dreams. Now you're back for revenge! (Rating: 4.26)

FishNeedWater

Help the fish get back to the water! An excellent physics puzzle game where you have to find a way to knock all of the fish back into the water. (Rating: 4.25)

Dibbles: For the Greater Good

Help the Dibbles get their king to safety. They will carry out any order you give them, even if it means certain death. Like Lemmings! (Rating: 4.24)

Liquid Measure 2

Route the water to the pots and exactly fill them all. Move the pieces to the right place to control the flow. A great puzzler! (Rating: 4.24)

Berzerk Ball

New weapons, new items and a sexy new character are all bundled in for you so you get the chance to beat your friends' high scores all over again! (Rating: 4.23)

Wake Up the Box 2

The boxes are back, and once again sleeping! Find ways to wake them up by placing objects on the playfield. (Rating: 4.22)

Mushroom Madness 3

Defend more mushrooms from hungry animals. Now with 300% more enemies, weapons, explosions and fun! Try to complete about 100 levels and get all quests and achievements. Be careful because The Hedgehog King is watching you... (Rating: 4.21)

City Siege 2: Resort Siege

Those baddies are back, but this time they are taking over the beach! This is no time to relax - get in there and sort them out! (Rating: 4.21)

GemCraft Labyrinth

After decades of preparation, the test you've been waiting for, the Labyrinth, has finally appeared before you... (Rating: 4.21)

Monster Castle Defense

Protect your queen from the evil human army that wants to destroy her. Summon monsters, upgrade, evolve and create a powerful army. (Rating: 4.21)

sugar, sugar

Draw and get enough sugar in the cups! Complete all 30 levels to unlock the bonus freeplay mode. In freeplay mode you can create your own sugar art! (Rating: 4.21)

City Siege

The city has been taken over by a hostile army. Build up your army with heavy military hardware and take back the streets - try not to destroy the city while you are at it! (Rating: 4.21)
